title: Graph of cognitive decline across lifespan

content.question: The information presented in the graph best represents which of the following aspects of developmental psychology research?

choices.label: The amount of time it takes for a child to learn the visual cliff
The progression of cognitive and physical abilities throughout the lifespan
An infantâ€™s interest in gazing at human faces
The number of friends people accumulate throughout the lifespan

content.answer: The progression of cognitive and physical abilities throughout the lifespan

skill.text: 3.A: Identify psychology-related concepts in descriptions or representations of data.
